Reviews.Title: Blue case with stylist
Reviews.Author: Eunice
Reviews.Content: This royal blue case fits the samsung s2 plus international phone nicely. It is a hard cover and even comes with a stylist that hangs in your earphone slot so it's easy to keep up with also I love the additional screen protector since I've been needing another screen protector for a while. Love it and couldn't have found a better one. Shipping did take some time but it's all worth it.

Reviews.Title: I like this item
Reviews.Author: Niamat
Reviews.Content: I choose this item because I want to cover my cell phone.It is excellent protect. I like it. thank you
